title: Commission Decision of 11 March 1994 amending for the third time and for the department of Loire-Atlantique, France, Decision 93/24/EEC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 11 March 1994 amending for the third time and for the department of Loire-Atlantique, France, Decision 93/24/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (94/163/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Annex I to Decision 93/24/EEC, 'Loire-Atlantique' is deleted.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 March 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 355, 5. 12. 1992, p. 32.
(3) OJ No L 16, 25. 1. 1993, p. 18.
(4) OJ No L 303, 10. 12. 1993, p. 27.
